main: ^"Oh, excuse me, but I must inquire, who are you?"
^"I'm a new reporter for the Newsday."
^"I'm following up a case by Arthur West. He couldn't finish his work because... he was fired.."
^"Well, I will show you what I showed him and nothing more. Here are the offices, and there's the on-air studio."
^She points to an empty desk with the title maintenence, the title reads Garret Hadem.
^"We had to let Garret go three months ago because he was too good at his job and there was nothing to repair."
^"Of course, though, whenever you aren't prepared is when it hits."
^She pulls out a completed maintenance request.
^"Luckily, Ronnie took a look at it. Bless that man."
^"Okay, that's all I have for you. Out you go!"
